# Load the qpNCA version to be validated (1.0.12)

```{r}

files.sources = list.files("./R", pattern = "\\.r$", full.names = T)
sapply(files.sources, source)

```

## Prepare the data

```{r}

curves_POSD = bind_rows(
  `START_POSD`,
  `SDT_1`,
  `SDT_2`,
  `SDT_3`,
  `SDC_1`,
  `SDC_2`,
  `SDC_3`
) |>
  mutate(
    dv = as.numeric(dv),
    loq = as.numeric(loq),
    bloq = ifelse(is.na(loq), 0, 1),
    excl_th = 0
  )
cov_POSD = curves_POSD |>
  distinct(id) |>
  mutate(dose = 1) |>
  select(id, dose)

curves_IVSD = bind_rows(
  `START_IVSD`,
  `SDC_4a`,
  `SDC_4b`,
  `SDC_4c`,
  `SDC_4d`
) |>
  mutate(
    dv = as.numeric(dv),
    loq = as.numeric(loq),
    bloq = ifelse(is.na(loq), 0, 1),
    excl_th = 0
  )
cov_IVSD = curves_IVSD |>
  distinct(id) |>
  mutate(dose = 1) |>
  select(id, dose)

curves_POMDnoss = bind_rows(
  `START_POMD`,
  `MDT_1`,
  `MDT_2`,
  `MDT_3`,
  `MDT_3a`,
  `MDC_1_noss`,
  `MDC_2_noss`,
  `MDC_3_noss`
) |>
  mutate(
    dv = as.numeric(dv),
    loq = as.numeric(loq),
    bloq = ifelse(is.na(loq), 0, 1),
    excl_th = 0
  )
cov_POMDnoss = curves_POMDnoss |>
  distinct(id) |>
  mutate(dose = 1) |>
  select(id, dose)

curves_POMDss = bind_rows(`MDC_1_ss`, `MDC_2_ss`, `MDC_3_ss`) |>
  mutate(
    dv = as.numeric(dv),
    loq = as.numeric(loq),
    bloq = ifelse(is.na(loq), 0, 1),
    excl_th = 0
  )
cov_POMDss = curves_POMDss |>
  distinct(id) |>
  mutate(dose = 1) |>
  select(id, dose)

curves_IVMD = bind_rows(`MDC_4a`, `MDC_4b`, `MDC_4c`, `MDC_4d`) |>
  mutate(
    dv = as.numeric(dv),
    loq = as.numeric(loq),
    bloq = ifelse(is.na(loq), 0, 1),
    excl_th = 0
  )
cov_IVMD = curves_IVMD |>
  distinct(id) |>
  mutate(dose = 1) |>
  select(id, dose)


```

## perform NCA on PO, SD curves (just for a test to see if everything works)

```{r, eval=T}

POSD = qpNCA(
  curves_POSD,
  by = c("id"),
  nomtimevar = "ntad",
  timevar = "tad",
  depvar = "dv",
  bloqvar = "bloq",
  loqvar = "loq",
  loqrule = 2,
  includeCmax = "Y",
  exclvar = "excl_th",
  plotdir = ,
  timelab = "Time (h)",
  deplab = "Concentration (ng/mL)",
  tau = 24,
  tstart = 4,
  tend = 12,
  teval = 18,
  covariates = "cov_POSD",
  dose = "dose",
  factor = 1000,
  reg = "SD",
  ss = "N",
  route = "EV",
  method = 1
)


```

## duplicate NTAD values in a curve create multiple entries in correction AND in pkpar output datasets: check for duplicates!

```{r, eval=T}

test = curves_POSD |> filter(id == -1)

extra = test |> filter(ntad == 12) |> mutate(tad = 11.8, dv = 3.5)

test = bind_rows(test, extra) |> arrange(id, ntad)

out = qpNCA(
  test,
  by = c("id"),
  nomtimevar = "ntad",
  timevar = "tad",
  depvar = "dv",
  bloqvar = "bloq",
  loqvar = "loq",
  loqrule = 2,
  includeCmax = "Y",
  exclvar = "excl_th",
  plotdir = ,
  timelab = "Time (h)",
  deplab = "Concentration (ng/mL)",
  tau = 24,
  tstart = 4,
  tend = 12,
  teval = 18,
  covariates = "cov_POSD",
  dose = "dose",
  factor = 1000,
  reg = "SD",
  ss = "N",
  route = "EV",
  method = 1
)

# OK tested
```

## Modify est.thalf function for more flexibility

```{r, eval=T}

test = curves_POSD |>
  filter(id %in% c(-1, 1, 2)) |>
  mutate(
    #startth=ifelse(id==1,18,NA),
    endth = ifelse(id == 1, 36, NA)
  ) |>
  mutate_cond(condition = id == -1 & ntad %in% c(24, 36), excl_th = 1)

th = est.thalf(
  test,
  by = c("id"),
  timevar = "tad",
  depvar = "dv",
  includeCmax = "Y",
  exclvar = "excl_th",
  startth = ,
  endth =
)

plot_reg(
  test,
  by = c("id"),
  th = th,
  bloqvar = "bloq",
  timevar = "tad",
  depvar = "dv",
  exclvar = "excl_th",
  plotdir = NA,
  timelab = "Time",
  deplab = "Conc"
)

# test new est_thalf with qpNCA call

out = qpNCA(
  test,
  by = c("id"),
  nomtimevar = "ntad",
  timevar = "tad",
  depvar = "dv",
  bloqvar = "bloq",
  loqvar = "loq",
  loqrule = 2,
  includeCmax = "Y",
  exclvar = "excl_th",
  startth = 12,
  endth = 24,
  plotdir = ,
  timelab = "Time (h)",
  deplab = "Concentration (ng/mL)",
  tau = 24,
  tstart = 4,
  tend = 12,
  teval = 18,
  covariates = "cov_POSD",
  dose = "dose",
  factor = 1000,
  reg = "SD",
  ss = "N",
  route = "EV",
  method = 1
)

# OK!!

```

## Modify est.thalf (InclCmax is set AFTER removal of the excluded samples: in that case id original Cmax is removed, a new one will be chosen. InclCmax=N will delete this newly chosen Cmax also!)

```{r}

test = curves_POSD |>
  filter(id %in% c(-1)) |>
  filter(ntad >= 18) |>
  mutate_cond(condition = ntad %in% c(18), excl_th = 1)

out = qpNCA(
  test,
  by = c("id"),
  nomtimevar = "ntad",
  timevar = "tad",
  depvar = "dv",
  bloqvar = "bloq",
  loqvar = "loq",
  loqrule = 2,
  includeCmax = "N",
  exclvar = "excl_th",
  startth = ,
  endth = ,
  plotdir = ,
  timelab = "Time (h)",
  deplab = "Concentration (ng/mL)",
  tau = 24,
  tstart = 4,
  tend = 12,
  teval = 18,
  covariates = "cov_POSD",
  dose = "dose",
  factor = 1000,
  reg = "SD",
  ss = "N",
  route = "EV",
  method = 1
)

#OK, modified and tested

```

## If there are more Nas at the end of the curve (e.g. loqrule==1 sets LOQs to NA) then the extrapolation doesnâ€™t start (lag(conc) is also NA)!!

```{r}

test = curves_POSD |>
  filter(id == -1) |>
  mutate(dose = 1) |>
  mutate_cond(condition = ntad >= 24, dv = NA) |>
  mutate_cond(condition = ntad == 24, tad = 24.5)


test_cov = test |> mutate(dose1 = 1) |> distinct(id, dose1)

out = qpNCA(
  test,
  by = c("id"),
  nomtimevar = "ntad",
  timevar = "tad",
  depvar = "dv",
  bloqvar = "bloq",
  loqvar = "loq",
  loqrule = 2,
  includeCmax = "N",
  exclvar = "excl_th",
  startth = ,
  endth = ,
  plotdir = ,
  timelab = "Time (h)",
  deplab = "Concentration (ng/mL)",
  tau = ,
  tstart = ,
  tend = ,
  teval = 24,
  covariates = "test_cov",
  dose = "dose1",
  infdur = ,
  factor = 1000,
  reg = "SD",
  ss = "N",
  route = "ev",
  method = 1
)

# OK, was already solved in lag_lead function
# Corrected unnecessary  time deviation correction if concentration at critical timepoint is missing (time will set to ptime during concentration inter/extrapolation)

```

## general testing on sorting order of input data

```{r}

test = curves_POSD |>
  filter(id == -1 | id == 1) |>
  mutate(dose = 1, trt = ifelse(id == -1, "A", "B"), factor = 10)
#                     mutate_cond(condition=id==-1&ntad==10,ntad=16) |>
#                     mutate_cond(condition=id==1&ntad==10,ntad=16)

test |>
  group_by(id) |>
  mutate(srtd = all(diff(ntad) > 0)) |>
  ungroup |>
  filter(srtd == F) |>
  distinct(id)


test_cov = test |> distinct(id, trt, dose)

out = qpNCA(
  test,
  by = c("id", "trt"),
  nomtimevar = "ntad",
  timevar = "tad",
  depvar = "dv",
  bloqvar = "bloq",
  loqvar = "loq",
  loqrule = 2,
  includeCmax = "N",
  exclvar = "excl_th",
  startth = ,
  endth = ,
  plotdir = ,
  timelab = "Time (h)",
  deplab = "Concentration (ng/mL)",
  tau = ,
  tstart = ,
  tend = ,
  teval = 24,
  covariates = "test_cov",
  dose = "dose",
  infdur = ,
  factor = 1000,
  reg = "SD",
  ss = "N",
  route = "ev",
  method = 1
)

```
